name: Final Exam
overview: Final Exam is a multiple choice text adventure game for the 8-bit Atari. The player has a big test coming up, and they must accrue 100 study units to successfully pass the exam. The player encounters a number of text-based scenarios, and must choose their response, and each response will cause the player to gain or lose a certain number of energy and time units. Events that can alter the player's energy and time include a kegger next door, disruptive flight patterns, a homicidal ex-girlfriend, your roommate's drug score, and your amorous girlfriend. These banked time and energy units can be converted to study units.
